name: safecrack
description:
You have so much money... but it's stuck inside you! Run into enemy attacks to release the cash inside you, then buy upgrades and more enemies to beat yourself up more! You just want it all out...

== controls ==
Move: Arrows / WASD
Shop: Enter / Esc
Purchase: Left Click

Made for Ludum Dare 44! Rate it here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/safecrack
